name: netMAGmedia Ltd
description:
netMAGmedia publish magazines, websites, email newsletters and social media opportunities to Architects, Specifiers, Housebuilders, Developers, Housing Associations and Selfbuilders. Visit us at Ecobuild to find out how your company can benefit from using our products. We look forward to meeting you!
Copies of all magazines will be available on our stand and demonstrations of our online products are available.

www.adfonline.eu, www.hbdonline.eu, www.sbhonline.eu and www.cpbponline.eu
